= Introduction =
	== What is SQL? ==
SQL(Structured Query Language) is a standard lenguaje for accessing and
manipulating databases that became the ANSI standar in 1986

	== What can SQL do? ==
	- Execute queries 
	- Retrive data from 
	- Insert data in 
	- Update data on 
	- Delete data from 
	- Create databases
	- Create tables in databases
	- Store procedures  
	- Create views
	- Set permissions

	= RDBMS =
	The Rational DataBase Management System is the basis of SQL.
 
	The data in RDBMS is stored in objects called tables, a table is 
	a collection of related data entries and consists of columns and rows.
 
	Every table is broken into smaller entities called fields,
	a field is a column in the table that is designed to maintain 
	specific information about every record, rows are also called records.
  
	A database most contain one or more
	tables, each of this tables is 
	identified by a name
